abstractContent.text: In this paper, we present the semantically enriched (SE) version of the Translation Interoperability Protocol (TIP).

TIP is designed to foster and enable the seamless sharing of data and information between different TMS based on open standards for data representations by means of the TIP Package (TIPP) as transport container.

SE-TIP is a research sideline that employs Semantic Web technologies to support modeling identification and interaction of sharing tasks, and uses the Web architecture to ensure extensibility and scalability of the SE approach.

entities.text: modeling identification and interaction of sharing tasks
